list.name: cheerleader
list.label: Cheerleader
list.description: Action: Give all players within 5 spaces 1 bonus roll this turn.

list.name: brawler
list.label: Brawler
list.description: Add two free bonus dice to any melee attack.

list.name: builder
list.label: Builder
list.description: Roll a D10 on barricade rolls. Add 1 additional bonus dice.

list.name: doctor
list.label: Doctor
list.description: Roll a D10 on first aid rolls. Add 1 additional bonus dice

list.name: gearhead
list.label: Gearhead
list.description: Start the game with 1 additional weapon, equipment, and inventory slot.

list.name: martial
list.label: Martial Artist
list.description: Start the game with bonus 3 defense.

list.name: scavenger
list.label: Scavenger
list.description: Draw 2 cards instead when you scavenge.

list.name: scout
list.label: Scout
list.description: Action Determine amount of enemies on other side of door.

list.name: sniper
list.label: Sniper
list.description: Add two free bonus dice to any ranged attacks.

list.name: speedy
list.label: speedy
list.description: Move additional 2 spaces during a move action.

list.name: sturdy
list.label: sturdy
list.description: Increase your starting health or your starting energy by 20.
